title: january 13: time’s up, money’s up
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about a salary snafu that ended with Mark Wahlberg donating $1.5 million to women’s rights. Then, Maia talks about a milestone that Ed Sheeran reached in 2016. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
